item.title: Useful Software/Tools
item.description: This is a living list of software/tools that I have used and found helpful. All of them are available for free or have a freemium version that gets the job done. Most of them are cross platform as well. VS Code Extensions Bracket Pair Colourizer Git Lens Spell Check : Will help avoid “nit” comments in your pull requests Fiddler : Monitor, search and edit network requests flowing in and out of your system.
